Festivals: ["Chicago International Children's Film Festival", 'Doc NYC', 'Fort Lauderdale International Film Festival', 'New Orleans Film Festival', 'Philadelphia Jewish Film Festival', 'Seattle True Independent Film Festival']
Title: Gen Bipin Rawat gets Padma Vibhushan
Narrative: As is the tradition, the government announced Padma awardees on the eve of Republic Day. Prominent among the awardees was late Gen Bipin Rawat, country' s first CDS, who has been given Padma Vibhushan highest civilian award befor Bharat Ratna. Gen Rawat died in a chopper crash along with his wife last year in December.
